name: wordpress-coolify-template
description: WordPress development template for Coolify deployment

scripts.install:all: npm run install:theme && npm run install:plugin
scripts.lint: npm run lint:theme && npm run lint:plugin
scripts.lint:theme: cd wp-content/themes/custom && npm run lint:css && npm run lint:js
scripts.lint:plugin: cd wp-content/plugins/custom-blocks && npm run lint:css && npm run lint:js
